description: Descubre los mejores hoteles en London, United Kingdom. Encuentra ofertas exclusivas y alojamientos de lujo.

hotels.title: London Victorian-Inspired Grandeur near Kensington Palace with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Cocktails
hotels.description: Step into a world of style, grace and charm at this refined retreat, a quintessentially British hotel in the heart of London. Discover the excitement of the city from the second you leave this stunning heritage-inspired hotel located near the royal residency of Kensington Palace. Enjoy a range of seasonal dishes or delight in a traditional afternoon tea that has been perfected to an art form at the Town House. Wander the beautifully fashionable streets to uncover world-class shopping at nearby King's Road and Sloane Street, or dive deep into history and culture at the Natural History Museum. Then, return to the Victorian grandeur that is this elegant hotel and enjoy a delicious cocktail at The K Bar, with its open fires and high ceilings.

hotels.title: Central London Sophistication near Big Ben with Daily Breakfast & Sky Terrace
hotels.description: Get a taste for the classic British lifestyle at H10 London Waterloo, an ideally located urban haven with easy access to London's most iconic landmarks. From the awe-inspiring London Eye and the royal surrounds of Buckingham Palace, to the leafy expanse of Hyde Park, towering Big Ben and ever-vibrant Leicester Square, you won't run out of things to see and do. Back on site, the hotel boasts contemporary flair woven seamlessly into its design, with avant-garde shapes and distinctive architecture mirroring the dynamic nature of London's cityscape. Ascend to the eighth-floor Waterloo Sky Bar to bask in breathtaking views of the London skyline while indulging in fashionable cocktails. After a day of urban adventure, recharge at the renowned Three O Two restaurant, where delectable Mediterranean cuisine awaits. For a lighter bite, stop by the Circus Bar before setting out to explore more of the city. Whatever you're in the mood for, you'll find something to tempt your taste buds.

hotels.title: Stylish London Escape Minutes from Heathrow Airport with Restaurant, Bar & Gym
hotels.description: Enjoy all the convenience of being on the doorstep of London's Heathrow Airport with a comfortable stay at Crowne Plaza London Heathrow T4, an IHG Hotel. Situated within the airport complex, this stylish property offers seamless access to the world beyond. When not jet-setting, explore the historic Windsor Castle, a mere 20-minute drive away, or venture into the vibrant heart of London. Onsite, maintain your fitness routine at the modern gym, savour modern British cuisine at Urban Brasserie, or end your day with a nightcap at Destinations Bar, offering an array of fine wines and craft beers.

hotels.title: Heritage London Escape with Stylish Cocktail Bars & Restaurants
hotels.description: Step back to the roaring 1920s when you stay at the heritage The Bloomsbury Hotel in London, just a stone's throw from Soho and Covent Garden. There's no need to venture far into the city's culinary scene when you have four exceptional venues onsite to choose from: order cocktails at The Bloomsbury Club Bar, sit under a floral canopy and enjoy light bites at the Coral Garden, indulge in afternoon tea at the Dalloway Terrace or sit under chandeliers at the marble bar of The Coral Room.

hotels.title: Art Deco London Escape next to Leicester Square
hotels.description: Step into the gilded lobby of the iconic Hotel Indigo London - 1 Leicester Square, an IHG Hotel, and embrace boutique Art Deco opulence in the heart of the legendary West End's theatre district. Each glamorously furnished room is and adorned with framed scripts, and is the perfect spot to recharge after exploring countless restaurants, ritzy bars and theatres nearby. Then, head to the LSQ Rooftop Bar & Restaurant for laidback plates and views of London's magical skyline.

hotels.title: London: Urban Leicester Square Resort with Fine Dining and Wellness Retreat
hotels.description: Located on London's iconic Leicester Square, The Londoner Hotel is your gateway to the West End. This urban haven boasts three guest-only spaces at The Residence, a soothing wellness retreat and eclectic collection of eateries. Dine izakaya-style on the rooftop at Shima Garden or enjoy an elegant pre-theatre menu at Whitcomb's, before a short stroll to a nearby playhouse. Take in a show at Her Majesty's Theatre or encounter the National Portrait Gallery's masterpieces.

hotels.title: Sophisticated London Haven in Heart of Marylebone
hotels.description: Discover refined elegance in the heart of vibrant Marylebone with a luxurious stay at The Marylebone London. These collections of bijou abodes are hidden away within the bustling and coveted Marylebone, set off Oxford Street, where the city’s high-end shopping, sophisticated dining and buzzing nightlife are aplenty. Fuel your day of sightseeing with a delectable meal at 108 Brasserie or be seduced by 108 Bar’s summer terrace and toast away to the remarkable London skyline.

hotels.title: Boutique West London Heritage Escape near Richmond Park
hotels.description: Step back in time at Richmond Hill Hotel, an elegant 18th-century Georgian townhouse in London’s leafy Richmond ranked within the top 10% of properties on Tripadvisor. Opulent interiors like high ceilings, stone fireplaces, ornate furniture and patterned wallpaper will leave you feeling like royalty, while modern touches such as underfloor heating are comfortable conveniences. Share a sophisticated meal at the award-winning 144 On the Hill restaurant, sit out on the sunny Terrace for an alfresco lunch, or choose from an extensive gin selection at the glamourous Bar & Lounge. Richmond Hill Hotel is nestled among some of London’s most beautiful sites, with Richmond Park (home to herds of friendly deer), the River Thames and Kew Gardens close by. Meanwhile, sightseeing in Central London is only a train ride away (approx. 30 minutes to London Waterloo).

hotels.title: London Heritage Luxury with Upscale Martini Bar
hotels.description: Experience the epitome of London sophistication when you stay at DUKES London, hidden away amid the heritage charms of St. James' Mayfair. Dining here is an elegant affair: try a signature martini at DUKES Bar (shaken, not stirred), which was frequently visited by James Bond author Ian Fleming. Classic British dishes are served with a fine dining inclination at GBR (Great British Restaurant), while the Cognac and Cigar Garden is the perfect way to cap off an evening of refinement.

hotels.title: Top-Rated London Boutique Heritage Escape near Hyde Park & Kensington Palace
hotels.description: The historic and cultural wonders of London are on your doorstep at Roseate House, London: a luxurious boutique hotel a stone’s throw from the beautiful Hyde Park and Kensington Gardens. Ranked in the top 1% of properties worldwide on Tripadvisor, the hotel has forty-eight rooms or suites spread across three heritage townhouses dating back to 1842. Each elegant room marries original Victorian features with contemporary luxury, showcasing original antiques and oil paintings from the era. From here, the entire city is at your fingertips. Paddington Station - where you can catch the London Underground, overground train services, and the Heathrow Express to the airport - is just a five-minute walk away. Spend your days exploring the world-famous Victoria and Albert Museum and Natural History Museum (both within walking distance of the hotel), ticking off the sights from Big Ben to London Bridge, shopping ‘til you drop at Oxford Street, Selfridges, Harrods, and Liberty London, and indulging in traditional British afternoon tea. And at the end of the day, you’ll have blissful spa treatments, innovative dining, and a sumptuous bed to sink into.

hotels.title: Contemporary Central London Stay Near Hyde Park and Buckingham Palace
hotels.description: Situated in the prestigious and leafy London suburb of Belgravia, Jumeirah Lowndes Hotel exudes sophistication and charm, with a selection of elegant and tastefully-styled rooms and suites. Just a stone's throw from some of London's most famous attractions, including Hyde Park, Buckingham Palace and the Natural History Museum, a stay at Jumeirah Lowndes Hotel puts you at the centre of all the action.

hotels.title: London West End Opulence with Onsite Spa & Michelin-Starred Dining
hotels.description: Experience the epitome of luxury in the heart of London at this five-star retreat masterfully positioned between Trafalgar Square and the vibrant Piccadilly Circus. This hotel exudes opulence with a sophisticated blend of French and British design, offering a tranquil escape from the city's lively pulse. Indulge in gastronomic delights at the hotel's Michelin-starred Wild Honey St James, serving traditional British fare with a French twist. The hotel's prime location places you within a stone's throw of London's most celebrated landmarks. Explore the rich history of the nearby Buckingham Palace, or immerse yourself in the world of art at the National Gallery. After a day of exploration, retreat to Sofitel Spa, where a range of rejuvenating treatments await.

hotels.title: Heritage London City Break near St. James Park
hotels.description: Add a touch of opulence to your London escape with a five-star stay at the boutique COMO The Halkin, masterfully positioned between leafy Knightsbridge and Belgravia’s wonderfully stuccoed streets. Boasting just 41 bespoke heritage rooms - many featuring spectacular park views - this refurbished Georgian townhouse retreat promises quiet luxury in the heart of the city. After days spent walking nearby Hyde Park or shopping at Mayfair, head to Halkin Bar for light plates, classic cocktails and high tea, or COMO Shambhala for wellness treatments with a personal touch.

hotels.title: London Heritage Grandeur on the River Thames with Daily Breakfast
hotels.description: On the banks of the River Thames, The Royal Horseguards, London offers a heritage stay in the very heart of one of the world’s most spellbinding cities. This magnificent, Victorian-era hotel is steeped in history, having hosted iconic figures throughout its colourful past. After days exploring the city's treasures, retreat to One Twenty One Two Restaurant for top-shelf spirits and exemplary British cuisine, Equus Bar for laidback fare and superb cocktails or savour bespoke high tea at The Lounge.

hotels.title: London Boutique Self-Contained South Kensington Apartments with Onsite Gym & Private Cinema
hotels.description: Tucked in the beating heart of Kensington, these apartments are your golden ticket to London's most coveted postcode. Imagine waking up with Hyde Park's emerald expanse on your doorstep, the Natural History Museum just minutes away, and the pulse of Kensington High Street's boutiques and cafe's thrumming with possibilities. Each apartment is your own miniature kingdom of comfort, with well-equipped kitchens and open-plan designs that transform the living spaces into fluid, light-filled sanctuaries. Private balconies capture London's skyline like a living, shifting canvas - it's an ideal escape for couples or families seeking an urban home away from home.

hotels.title: Unique London West End Retreat near Soho w. Onsite Restaurant & Bar
hotels.description: Step into a dreamlike world with a stay in the heart of London's West End, just moments from popular Soho and Covent Garden. Blurring the line between Baroque and modern interiors, the whimsical style of this hotel will leave you wanting more. Savour the curated seasonal menu at The Restaurant, enjoy a cocktail with friends at The Terrace, or try something different with an iconic Mad Hatters Afternoon Tea, inspired by the majestic world of Alice in Wonderland.

hotels.title: Heritage-Listed London Opulence in Former Baroque-Style Church Near Covent Garden
hotels.description: Step back in time with a retreat to this turn-of-the-century, heritage-listed former church, now extravagantly transformed into a luxury hotel by world-leading designer Jacques Garcia. Showcasing Baroque-style furnishings, bold décor and a lavish restaurant and bar, L'oscar London is a five-star sanctuary and the perfect base to discover London's vibrant shopping, dining and theatre scene, with iconic Covent Garden and the city's main attractions right on your doorstep.

hotels.title: Five-Star London Luxury Overlooking The Royal Parks
hotels.description: Stay in modern luxury in the heart of Mayfair at the five-star Intercontinental London Park Lane, an IHG Hotel, superbly positioned next to the Royal Parks. Experience signature sophistication at this exquisite hotel perfectly positioned near London's best sights, including Buckingham Palace, Harrods and Knightsbridge. At the end of each day, return to your tranquil base and enjoy sumptuous Italian dining onsite or admire the views of the Wellington arch while sipping on a cocktail in The Arch Bar.

hotels.title: Five-Star Hyde Park Escape in the Heart of London with Two-Michelin-Starred Restaurant
hotels.description: Stay in the glamorous district of Knightsbridge with leafy Hyde Park on your doorstep at the five-star Mandarin Oriental Hyde Park, London. Enjoy a traditional British afternoon tea at The Rosebery, visit The Aubrey London for a unique Japanese izakaya experience or sip on refreshing cocktails at the stylish Mandarin Bar. The hotel's crowning glory, however, is the two-Michelin-starred Dinner by Heston Blumenthal, a celebrated restaurant with a focus on historic gastronomy. After your feast is finished, transcend into bliss at the Spa at Mandarin Oriental, London, where 13 treatment rooms, a 17-metre indoor pool and a fully-equipped fitness centre await for all your health and wellness needs.

hotels.title: South London Pet-Friendly Apartments & Studios with Onsite Restaurant
hotels.description: Feel at home in South London at this contemporary property, ideally located in the heart of Sutton. Each stylish apartment or studio features a fully equipped kitchen and modern amenities, making for the perfect place to retreat to after a day of exploration. Head to Charlie's Corner Bar - an onsite bar, restaurant and cafe - for a coffee or heartwarming meal. Spend your days exploring everything that this vibrant district has to offer such as the expansive Nonsuch Park and heritage Whitehall Historic House, or catch the tube into London for a day of sightseeing.

hotels.title: Jumeirah Elegance in the Heart of London with World-Class Tea Room
hotels.description: Indulge in a five-star stay in London’s Jumeirah Carlton Tower London, where contemporary living marries high-end sophistication. Nestled a short distance between two of the most spectacular working royal residences, this hotel is your key to uncovering inner-city London's best architecture, history and glamour. Enjoy the seafood-centred menu at Al Mare restaurant, serving Italian-inspired cuisine, and the luxurious afternoon tea presented at The Chinoiserie Tea Room. Inspired by British garden flora, the tea room is a calming and sophisticated haven, showcasing the genius of pastry chef Jessica Prealpato, who creates delicate bites bursting with flavour. The world-class Peak Fitness Club & Spa adds to this retreat's luxury, with its stunning 20-metre glass-roofed indoor pool, a true London rarity.

hotels.title: London City Break Along the River Thames with Five Onsite Bars & Restaurants
hotels.description: Experience timeless luxury on the Greenwich Peninsula at InterContinental London - The O2, an IHG Hotel, where London icons like the River Thames and Canary Wharf make up the scenery. Noteworthy facilities include the UK's largest pillar-free ballroom and the heavenly spa, which offers rejuvenating treatments and has an indoor heated pool, sauna and steam room. Five onsite eateries offer an exceptional venture into high tea, world-glass gin and tonics, and market-style dining.

hotels.title: Elegant Five-Star Retreat in the Heart of London
hotels.description: Escape to an elegant oasis in the heart of London's most famous and exclusive neighbourhood with a stay at The May Fair, A Radisson Collection Hotel. Within walking distance of Bond Street, Picadilly Circus, Green Park, Oxford Street and Buckingham Palace, discover a heritage hotel featuring luxuriously spacious bedrooms, the award-winning and contemporary Italian and Spanish May Fair Kitchen, May Fair Bar and a soothing spa. The hotel also offers a private screening room, three event spaces for 370 people and 11 private suites.

hotels.title: Arty London City Escape with Upscale Italian Restaurant
hotels.description: Be inspired by unique décor and local artwork when you stay at Hotel Indigo London Paddington, located a stone's throw from the world-famous Hyde Park. Gourmands will delight in a taste of Italy at Bella Italia Paddington, while the adjoining bar is the perfect spot for Long Island iced tea or mojito. When it's time to work up a sweat, head to the 24-hour gym, or skip the workout and savour a coffee on the al fresco terrace before heading out to enjoy the wonders of London.

hotels.title: Heritage London Break in Iconic Kensington near Hyde Park
hotels.description: A contemporary blend of modernity, vibrant splashes of colour and Victorian heritage, the Hotel Indigo London - Kensington, an IHG Hotel, is ideally positioned in the heart of the buzzing capital. Set behind the Victorian façade of former luxury townhouses, the discreet hotel pays homage to iconic Londoners and landmarks on its walls, setting you up for days spent exploring the nearby Hyde Park, National History Museum and Kensington Palace.

hotels.title: Chic Central London Retreat near Covent Garden with Hidden Speakeasy Bar & All-Day Cafe
hotels.description: Step into a surrealist wonderland in the dramatic heart of London's West End at this captivating five-star urban sanctuary, designed with an eccentric flair. With fabulous full-length mirrors, ornate carpets and unique lighting, this fashionable abode is a stone's throw from the city's world-renowned theatres and the iconic Covent Garden Market. Spend your days exploring all that the English capital has to offer before returning to savour global cuisines at the hotel's restaurant and sip on tea-themed signature cocktails at the secret speakeasy bar, Blind Spot.

hotels.title: Heritage Five-Star Retreat within the Heart of London
hotels.description: Step into a life of pure elegance at Kimpton Fitzroy London, an IHG Hotel, a gorgeous 19th-century landmark building in the heart of the city. This hotel overlooks the lush Russell Square park and is the perfect location to explore the Big Smoke like a true Londoner. Discover the beautiful cobblestone streets, hidden alleyways and iconic city monuments, then return to this lavish hotel, where you feel like royalty, to enjoy a cocktail at Fitz's bar, or experience exquisite dining at the Galvin Bar & Grill.

hotels.title: Five-Star London Luxury near Hyde Park
hotels.description: COMO Metropolitan London is a luxury five-star stay opposite Hyde Park that offers a refined haven in the heart of the city. Indulge with in-room locally sourced COMO Shambhala Cuisine or head to Nobu for elegant Japanese-Peruvian fusion cuisine, then melt away tension with a rejuvenating treatment at the spa. As the sun sets, retire to a sophisticated room or suite boasting sumptuous bedding and impressive design.

hotels.title: Central London Bohemian Hideaway near St. Paul's Cathedral with Onsite Restaurant
hotels.description: Enjoy understated elegance at Hyde London City, where a bohemian spirit flows throughout. Let your senses be transported at the authentic Leydi Turkish restaurant, as aromatic shish dishes and traditional meze platters make for an enticing dining journey. Whether energising in the fitness centre or unwinding in your artfully designed room, a comfortable stay is guaranteed. Find yourself at the crossroads of London's most captivating stories, with alleyways that reveal award-winning eateries and chic rooftop bars. By day, explore Leadenhall Market or check out the Whispering Gallery at St. Paul's Cathedral. By night, watch the city turn into a playground of entertainment, from nightlife in Shoreditch to immersive shows in the West End.

hotels.title: Elegant Five-Star Escape Minutes from Kensington Palace
hotels.description: Step into a world of style, grace and charm with a luxurious stay at The Kensington, a quintessentially British hotel in the heart of London. Discover the excitement of the city from the second you leave this stunning heritage-inspired hotel. Wander the beautifully fashionable streets to uncover world-class shopping, history and culture, before returning to the Victorian grandeur that is this hotel, and enjoy a glass of wine at The K Bar, along with open fires and high ceilings.

hotels.title: Central London South Kensington Self-Contained Apartments near Gloucester Road & Natural History Museum
hotels.description: Feel like a London local in these self-contained, stylish apartments, located in the heart of South Kensington. Each unit offers a home away from home, complete with fully equipped kitchens, laundry facilities and spacious living areas. Step outside to world-renowned museums, including the Natural History Museum and the Victoria & Albert Museum. Savour the flavours of London at nearby Michelin-starred restaurants or take a leisurely stroll to the independent boutique shopping on Gloucester Road, just a stone's throw away.

hotels.vendor_name: The Marble Arch Hotel by Thistle
hotels.title: Central London Luxury opposite Hyde Park with Daily Breakfast
hotels.description: London is calling. The Marble Arch Hotel is a combination of modern luxuries, heritage charm and exquisite inner-city London lifestyle. Nestled between Oxford Street and Hyde Park, there is truly no better way to experience the glamour and grandeur of London. Step outside the hotel to witness the iconic Marble Arch, then explore, shop and fall in love with the city before returning to indulge in a cheeky cocktail and quintessentially British meal at Archy's Bar.

hotels.title: Boutique Central London Hideaway in the Heart of Covent Garden with Daily Breakfast
hotels.description: In the heart of London's West End sits the Parisian-inspired, ultra-stylish Henrietta Hotel, an elegant double townhouse that celebrates all the finer things in life: fabulous food, daring design, delicious drinks and an unbeatable Central London location. A stone's throw from Soho, The Strand and Leicester Square, the boutique hotel is perfectly placed to move through the historic cobbled streets with ease, while soaking up the exciting atmosphere at your own pace. Be sure to grab a pint at the pub, indulge in world-class culinary delights, wander through the nearby markets and boutiques, catch a theatre show or take time to visit the exceptional museums and galleries. After a day of exploration, the hotel's 40 rooms and suites feel like a welcome escape from the bustling streets below. Taking design cues from Covent Garden’s rich history, each space features retro touches, pastel hues and bold contrasting shapes to create a visual treat. The unique aesthetic continues in the ground-floor restaurant, Henri, where fresh pasta and seasonal vegetables take centre stage in dishes inspired by Parisian bistros, while the bar serves up innovative, refreshing cocktails.

hotels.title: Pet-Friendly London Riverside Apartment Retreat Near Tower Bridge with Fitness Centre
hotels.description: Escape to a riverside haven at this stylish all-apartment hotel, where sweeping views of the River Thames and Tower Bridge are the perfect backdrop for your London stay. Whether for a short getaway or a longer retreat, enjoy five-star service and elegant apartments that provide the ultimate comfort. Ideally situated for exploring landmarks like the Tower of London, Borough Market, The Shard and lively riverside eateries, this hotel offers effortless access to the heart of the city. After a day of sightseeing, return to your ultra-modern sanctuary and relax in the luxury you deserve.

hotels.title: Royal-Worthy London Stay Steps from Buckingham Palace & Hyde Park
hotels.description: Just moments from Buckingham Palace, discover a palatial haven of historic beauty and modern comforts in the heart of London’s Westminster at The Clermont London, Victoria. Step into the grand foyer, marvel at the intricate Baroque stylings and begin to instantly relax. Enjoy restful stays in rooms designed to perfection, indulge in delightful Asian eats at The Soak, or unwind after days spent exploring UK’s vibrant capital with a drink at the cosy Reunion Bar.

hotels.title: West London Urban Bliss with Alfresco Skyline Terrace
hotels.description: Less than 30 minutes from Heathrow Airport and London's bustling West End, Holiday Inn London West, an IHG Hotel, is perfectly positioned for comfort and convenience as you explore the iconic capital city. Having recently undergone a multi-million-pound renovation, the entire hotel is sleek, and shiny and has all the mod-cons you'd need for a comforting stay. Order a Starbucks coffee from the Lobby cafe, sit out on the open-air terrace and enjoy a high-intensity workout at the well-equipped gym.

hotels.title: Boutique Chelsea Apartments near Buckingham Palace and Sloane Square
hotels.description: Escape to this sophisticated collection of apartments in London's prestigious Chelsea district, perfectly perched near Hyde Park and the West End. Situated within walking distance of Buckingham Palace, the Saatchi Gallery and the luxury boutiques of Sloane Street, these residences provide instant access to London's vibrant landscape. Each meticulously designed apartment features a fully-equipped kitchen and living area, as well as amenities that cater to short- and long-term stays, like a 24-hour gym and 24-hour reception. The apartments carefully curated interiors that reflect the dynamic energy of West London as well as being a tranquil retreat from the capital's urban hustle, offering the best of both worlds.

hotels.title: Iconic Raffles London Opulence Near Buckingham Palace with Guerlain Spa & Michelin-Starred Restaurant
hotels.description: Indulge in a stay in one of London's most opulent and distinguished hotels, set in the heart of the city's historic Whitehall district. This stunning five-star hotel is housed in the former Old War Office building, boasting a blend of Edwardian Baroque architecture and modern elegance. With an array of gourmet dining options, including a chic rooftop restaurant, Michelin-starred dining room and a sophisticated whisky lounge, every culinary desire is catered for. Raffles London at the OWO's prime location places you within walking distance of London's most celebrated landmarks, including the Houses of Parliament, the London Eye and the vibrant South Bank. After a day of exploration, retreat to the hotel's serene wellness centre for a rejuvenating treatment or enjoy a leisurely swim in the indoor pool.

hotels.title: Langham Luxury in London's West End with Onsite Spa, Tavern & Cocktail Lounge
hotels.description: Live and breathe the grandeur of London's iconic West End with a five-star stay at The Langham London. Featuring a blend of British heritage and modern luxury, sample myriad cuisines at the Palm Court, tuck into reimagined pub fare at The Wigmore and sip on epic cocktails at the Artesian cocktail lounge. Moments from the bustling Oxford Circus and the world-renowned British Museum, after a day of exploring, relax with a swim in the indoor pool or pamper yourself at the lavish Chuan Spa.

hotels.title: Elegant Central London Retreat Opposite Hyde Park with Fine-Dining Restaurants & Onsite Spa
hotels.description: Indulge in unparalleled luxury at this Regency-style masterpiece, the crowning jewel of London’s hospitality, set within a meticulously restored 1820s palace. Behind its stately facade, discover the opulent Lanesborough Grill, where the richly adorned dining room beneath a resplendent domed ceiling offers a feast for both the eyes and the palate. Meanwhile, the exclusive Lanesborough Club & Spa invites you to unwind with bespoke treatments that epitomize sophistication and rival the offerings of the world’s most elite private members' clubs. Back in your room or suite, 24-hour butler service will ensure that every detail is accounted for, whatever your desires may be. Commanding London’s most prestigious address at the crossroads of Knightsbridge and Belgravia, this hotel exudes regal charm. Just steps away, Hyde Park’s 350 acres of royal greenery beckon, while a short stroll leads to the exquisite boutiques of Sloane Street, the glamour of Harvey Nichols and the legendary Harrods.

hotels.title: Stylish Waterfront London Escape near O2 & ExCel London
hotels.description: Fall into London sophistication at the Crowne Plaza London Docklands, an IHG Hotel, in the vibrant city's inner east, with historic landmarks and the iconic River Thames only a short distance away. After breakfast at the Docklands Bar & Grill, take a short ride on the Tube to the city’s bustling centre or be whisked away on a cable car ride over the river, with panoramic views of Canary Wharf and the Docklands. Quintessential sights, like the imposing Tower of London, are not to be missed, and you're perfectly located for events at The O2 or the ExCeL London exhibition centre.

hotels.title: Boutique London Opulence near Buckingham Palace with Michelin-Starred Restaurant & Private Garden
hotels.description: Enjoy quintessentially British luxury and unparalleled hospitality at this traditional stay in the heart of Belgravia, one of London's most exclusive neighbourhoods. As the closest hotel to Buckingham Palace, this prestigious retreat has been a Royal favourite since it first opened its doors in 1910, hosting royalty from all corners of the world over the years. Indulge in Michelin-starred fare at The Dining Room, experience a traditional afternoon tea service at The Lounge, or stop over at the lavish Goring Cocktail Bar to sample its vibrant list of expertly crafted cocktails, made up of over one hundred different herbs taken directly from The Goring Garden. Set on a peaceful, leafy street in one of the city's most desirable neighbourhoods, The Goring Hotel is a testament to timeless elegance and modern comfort. Its ideal location allows for shopping sprees on nearby Sloane Street or catching a West End theatre performance at the Victoria Palace Theatre. Whether you're visiting for business or leisure, you're invited to experience out-of-this-world refinement and impeccable service.

hotels.title: London Five-Star Art Deco Escape near Buckingham Palace
hotels.description: Surround yourself with Art Deco splendour in London's prestigious Mayfair amid the refined five-star luxury of The Athenaeum Hotel & Residences - a boutique heritage hotel completely restored and brought back to its original grandeur. Erected in 1849 and overlooking Green Park, with views over the treetops and across the city from the exclusive, guest-only rooftop bar and lounge, this swanky hotel puts everything you need at your fingertips. Unwind with complimentary access to the spa's steaming hot tubs, saunas and steam rooms, be wined and dined at 116 at The Athenaeum restaurant and immerse yourself in the glory of the West End and Mayfair just beyond the hotel's double front doors. Step outside and embrace the beauty of London with the prestigious Park Lane and Hyde Park on your doorstep and the icons of London - Buckingham Palace, Westminster Abbey and Piccadilly Circus - all within a stone's throw.

hotels.title: London's Coolest Hotel Stay with World-Class Nobu Restaurant
hotels.description: Effortlessly chic and named 'London's coolest hotel' by Forbes, Nobu Hotel Portman Square is one of London's most sought-after city stays. Its stellar location in Marylebone just off Oxford Street means some of the city's best shopping and restaurants are at your fingertips. However, thanks to four exceptional onsite dining venues, there's no need to venture far for a top-notch meal. Pioneered by Chef Nobu Matsuhisa, the world-renowned Nobu restaurant serves up a tantalising menu of Japanese dishes - try the rock shrimp tempura, miso black cod and yellowtail sashimi. When you're not wining and dining, join a Nobu pilates class or indulge in a spa experience at the wellness centre.

hotels.title: Grand Central London Heritage Retreat Minutes from Trafalgar Square
hotels.description: Contemporary elegance meets historic charm at the renowned The Clermont London, Charing Cross, located opposite Trafalgar Square. London’s world-famous monuments, galleries and restaurants are all waiting at your doorstep, with the convenient Charing Cross tube station at your beck and call. Built in the mid-1800s, the French Renaissance character shines through the grand interior, but rooms and facilties are fantastically modern and fresh.

hotels.title: Stylish London Stay at Heathrow Airport with Onsite Dining & Spa
hotels.description: Relish convenience and sophistication at this stylish retreat, just a stone's throw from London's Heathrow Airport. Find an oasis of calm amidst the energy of one of the world's busiest airports. Savour exquisite French cuisine at La Belle Epoque restaurant, sip on cocktails at the chic Sphere Bar & Lounge or experience French glamour at Le Bar Parisien. Just steps away from the hotel, you'll find the Heathrow Express, whisking you to central London in under 30 minutes. Explore the city's world-renowned museums, historic landmarks and vibrant shopping districts, or venture further afield to the picturesque English countryside. Back at the hotel, work up a sweat at the fitness centre, or pamper yourself at the tranquil spa before your flight.

hotels.title: Central London Hyde Park Stay with Iconic Live Music Bar
hotels.description: Inspired by London's illustrious music history, The Cumberland, London is full of English charm. Propped up against Oxford Street, this stay is an explorers paradise, with only minutes between you and London's foremost attractions. When you're not strolling along Hyde Park, wine and dine at London's foremost music and dining experience at the onsite Sound Bar, home to live music seven days a week.

hotels.title: Stylish London City Break Near Kings Cross Station
hotels.description: Experience elegant sophistication in the heart of London at Crowne Plaza London - Kings Cross, an IHG Hotel. Just moments from St Pancras station, where the Eurostar connects London to Europe, find yourself within easy reach of the city's historic landmarks. Hop on the tube and zip over to the bars and restaurants of Covent Garden, the designer shopping in Kensington and the nightlife of Shoreditch. When it's time to retire, savour luxurious linens and a modern fitness centre.

hotels.title: Five-Star Shangri-La Luxury in London’s Iconic The Shard Landmark with Infinity Skypool
hotels.description: Claiming prime real estate across 18 floors of The Shard, Shangri-La Hotel, At the Shard brings Southeast Asian flair to the banks of the River Thames and offers everything you need for a truly lavish city stay. Glide up to your room and watch London life unfold through floor-to-ceiling panoramic windows, savour a cup of Chinese tea at TĪNG or take in a hand-crafted cocktail at GŎNG bar and admire the shifting colours of the sunset over the city skyline. After a morning dip in the indoor infinity pool, explore the colourful galleries of Tate Modern and the majestic architecture of St Paul's Cathedral, both within easy reach of the hotel’s front doors.

seo.description: Encuentra los mejores hoteles en London, United Kingdom con ofertas exclusivas. Reserva tu escapada perfecta con hasta 60% de descuento.
